item.title: Augmented Reality's 6th Sense
item.description: This updated article now lives on Medium “Does AR give us a sixth sense?“â€Š- https://link.medium.com/upEkfPnRST Does AR give us a 6th sense? Augmented Reality (AR) is the mixture of the real world and virtual worlds so that one understands the other. The medium affords a deeper connection with the real world giving context without breaking its laws. What makes AR a powerful medium is that it even supersedes our visual senses.
